description:
I recommend this application as a website/static site/blog writing tool.

As a web tech person, I tend to be biased against WYSIWYG tools and "site builders" and like things to be done either by hand.

Publii surprised me in an extremely good way. It's well structured, has quite good export, the websites and pages produced are generated, but not overly detailed and have great Lighthouse marks. It offers social network integration. The WYSIWYG editor is simple to use and totally ready for non-technical people. 

It has integrated some of the some popular ways of deploying static sites (S3, Netlify, Git[Hub|Lab] Pages, Git, (s)ftp, plain zip export and more. 

The only thing it's lacking is good versioning support. Regardless, I would recommend this over Wordpress or similar CMS.
summary: Really capable tool for building sites for non-tech people

description: Very easy to use and works well. Lots of tweakable themes.
summary: great blogging platform without the bloat
